protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for a number of inflammatory CC-chemokines including MIP-1-alpha, MIP-1-beta and RANTES and subsequently transduces a signal by increasing the intracellular calcium ion level. May play a role in the control of granulocytic lineage proliferation or differentiation. Acts as a coreceptor (CD4 being the primary receptor) for HIV-1 R5 isolates

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
